snippet: In this edition of the SNY.tv Metro Hockey Podcast, Christopher Botta discusses the Rangers, the Devils and the Islanders with Steve Zipay of Newsday, Scott Cullen of TSN and Kevin Shultz of Islanders Point Blank.
abstract: In this edition of the SNY.tv Metro Hockey Podcast, Christopher Botta discusses the Rangers, the Devils and the Islanders with Steve Zipay of Newsday, Scott Cullen of TSN and Kevin Shultz of Islanders Point Blank.
lead_paragraph: In this edition of the SNY.tv Metro Hockey Podcast, Christopher Botta discusses the Rangers, the Devils and the Islanders with Steve Zipay of Newsday, Scott Cullen of TSN and Kevin Shultz of Islanders Point Blank. All three teams will be play on home ice Thursday night.
